snippet: Navi Pillay condemned Iraq’s execution of 42 prisoners over two days this week as “obscene and inhuman” and warned that they undermined efforts to reduce violence.
abstract: United Nations human rights chief Navi Pillay condemns Iraq’s execution of 42 prisoners, denouncing such mass executions as 'obscene and inhuman' and warning that they undermine efforts to reduce violence and achieve a more stable society.
lead_paragraph: Navi Pillay condemned Iraq’s execution of 42 prisoners over two days this week as “obscene and inhuman” and warned that they undermined efforts to reduce violence.

headline.main: United Nations Human Rights Chief Condemns Mass Executions in Iraq

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
